alert.note: Alert for Tulsa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 1:36PM CDT until May 06 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo affecting Tulsa County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Bird Creek near Owasso-Mingo. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, faster flows are expected along the river but no flooding occurs. Interests near the river and near Mohawk Park should continue to monitor later forecasts. At 18.0 feet, minor flooding occurs at Mohawk Park and along 56th Street North near Mingo Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.6 feet this evening. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
